content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 100.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards

State Regulations
(a) The general
seed certification standards are basic and together with the following specific
standards constitute the standards for the certification of grass
seed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
100.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
